ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: The Camera Hardware team develops cutting edge camera solutions and technologies for Apple’s products, including the iPhone, iPad, MacBooks, and more. The key goal of the team is to enable the world’s best camera experience for our customers. New challenges arise everyday that require the sharp problem-solving skills of talented and smart individuals. The team features a collaborative and hands-on environment that fosters engineering excellence, creativity, and innovation. We are seeking a Product / Module Packaging engineer to support many of our camera hardware engineering projects.

ul.li: 5+ years experience working with Consumer Electronics module packaging, with diverse experience in areas such as MEMs, Optical packaging, Camera Modules and related semiconductor EOL packaging
Work closely with internal cross functional teams, Product Design, Test, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering and EPM
Understanding of manufacturing, and transition from development to mass production
Ability to work with international teams and travel

div.p:
Core responsibilities:
Work as the key packaging / process engineer supporting complex, high volume camera modules and semiconductor related packaging modules Provide leadership in the areas of module construction, materials, equipment, processes, reliability, and testing Participate in the selection of vendors, Work with vendors to develop MP intent equipment, process and materials Provide leadership to a team of Asia based process engineers supporting the process development and qualification Provide communication to senior management on issues as needed Perform problem solving and complex data analysis, FACA and recommended preventive action and measures Travel to vendor sites will be required
BS/MS/PhD in Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering or equivalent
Travel to Apple's and suppliers' facilities will be required for production bring up.
